body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Attack with Woebearer What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: Woebearer has Fear, and so should not be blockable except by artifact and black creatures.

Actual: computer blocks with Goblin Ruinblaster, which is red and not an artifact. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.44 on Windows 7


Relevant part of game.log:

LOG (P): Igor attacks with Diregraf Captain, Mikaeus, the Unhallowed and Woebearer.
MMAB cheat=false index=1 life=11 turn=28 phase=DeclareAttackers slice=8000 time=910
* [157/1489/99900000 at 4] (pass)
  [157/1496/99900000 at 4] (Treetop Village)
MMAB cheat=false index=1 life=11 turn=28 phase=DeclareBlockers slice=8000 time=904
* [157/1468/99900000 at 4] ( Woebearer=Goblin Ruinblaster)
  [157/1456/99900000 at 4] ( Diregraf Captain=Goblin Ruinblaster)
  [157/1/-99900000 at 0] ()
LOG (C): Computer blocks with Goblin Ruinblaster.
author: [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/)
title: Woebearer doesn't seem to have Fear

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision e8b7d0ddb2c2 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: Thanks for catching this. Missing fear added back.
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/) on January 01, 2014 05:20:10_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Attack with Woebearer What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: Woebearer has Fear, and so should not be blockable except by artifact and black creatures.

Actual: computer blocks with Goblin Ruinblaster, which is red and not an artifact. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.44 on Windows 7


Relevant part of game.log:

LOG (P): Igor attacks with Diregraf Captain, Mikaeus, the Unhallowed and Woebearer.
MMAB cheat=false index=1 life=11 turn=28 phase=DeclareAttackers slice=8000 time=910
* [157/1489/99900000 at 4] (pass)
  [157/1496/99900000 at 4] (Treetop Village)
MMAB cheat=false index=1 life=11 turn=28 phase=DeclareBlockers slice=8000 time=904
* [157/1468/99900000 at 4] ( Woebearer=Goblin Ruinblaster)
  [157/1456/99900000 at 4] ( Diregraf Captain=Goblin Ruinblaster)
  [157/1/-99900000 at 0] ()
LOG (C): Computer blocks with Goblin Ruinblaster.
